description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

description: Receivable Repayment Data contains all the information about Receivable Repayment.

validation.validation: Repayment amount of [Repayment Amount in Repayment Currency] is greater than outstanding Receivable balance of [Outstanding Balance in Repayment Currency].
You can't change the Company or Expense Payee. Match the fields to the original receivable payment.
Payee does not have an outstanding receivable repayment balance.
Expense Repayment is in Cancelled status. You can't update it.
The currency must match the reimbursement currency of the expense payee.
